extension.name: Events Booking - Upcoming Events
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.description: This module is used to display up-coming events in Events Booking

field.name: display_event_type
field.label: Display Event Type
field.description: Choose whether to show or hide location of events in the module

field.name: show_short_description
field.label: Show short description
field.description: Choose to show or hide short description in the horizontal layout

field.name: only_show_featured_events
field.label: Only Show Featured Events
field.description: If set to Yes, only featured events will be shown on this module

field.name: category_ids
field.label: Categories
field.description: Select categories which you want to display events

field.name: exclude_category_ids
field.label: Exclude Categories
field.description: Select categories which you want to exclude events from

field.name: location_id
field.label: Locations
field.description: Choose the locations which you want to display events

field.name: created_by
field.label: Created By
field.description: If you select a user here, the module will only display events created by the selected user

field.name: show_category
field.label: Show Category
field.description: Choose whether to show or hide category name in the module

field.name: show_location
field.label: Show Location
field.description: Choose whether to show or hide location of events in the module

field.name: show_children_events
field.label: Show children events
field.description: Choose whether to show or hide children events in the module

field.name: show_thumb
field.label: Show Thumbnail
field.description: Choose whether to show or hide thumbnail of events in the module

field.name: show_price
field.label: Show Price
field.description: Set to Yes will show price of the event

field.name: title_linkable
field.label: Title Linkable
field.description: If set to No, title of the event displayed in the module won't be linked to event details page

field.name: link_event_to_registration_form
field.label: Link Event To Registration Form
field.description: If set to Yes, click on title of event will redirect users to registration form of the event instead of showing event details page.

field.name: number_events
field.label: Number Events
field.description: Number of events to be showed on the module

field.name: order_by
field.label: Order By
field.description: Choose how to sort/order events for this menu item

field.name: order_direction
field.label: Order Direction
field.description: Choose how to sort/order events for this menu item
